About me

I am a self-taught Web Developer, currently focused on the Front-End of the Web. Committed to creating accessible, beautiful, and practical digital products that bring value for others. This website is a showcase of my work as a Software Developer.

Enthusiastic about Software

Software Development occupies #1 spot on my passions list for quite some time now, and it's not going to change any time soon. Beyond software, I'm also passionate, among other things, about Business Development, History, Global Politics, or Grand Strategy Games.

Active in the Community

I manage to keep up to date with modern practices and trends in Web Development by being a part of the Developer Community across various platforms, and I consider it essential to be a successful developer on my own.

Determined to learn

To constantly improve, I have embraced a lifelong learning attitude, and I'm eager to challenge myself with new projects and new concepts of technologies I already have experience with.

Tech Stack

This is the Tech Stack I am currently working with. My main goal is to constantly improve fluency with these technologies, eventually becoming a full-fledged, and accomplished Front-End Developer. While working on this stuff, I'm also expanding my knowledge of Web Design, UI/UX, and SEO.

Self Development

My long term objective is to start working with some of the technologies below and to make a smooth transition into a Full-Stack Web Developer. I am also interested in working on Genetic Algorithms sometime in the future, which certainly brings Machine Learning and AI to the table. As a Software Developer, learning new things is inevitable, and I believe that doing this at a reasonable pace makes the danger of becoming Jack of All Trades, Master of None not applicable.

Building great things is what makes us great

I agree
